Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Barco MMPC-4127F1 (PP27QHD) display system for reviewing and interpreting digital histopathology images.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use to display digital images of histopathology slides from validated IVD-labeled whole-slide imaging scanners for review and interpretation by pathologists; not for use with images from frozen section, cytology, or non-formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded hematopathology specimens.
